game.name: Worms Reloaded: Time Attack Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Worms™ Reloaded "Time Attack" pack features 20 new heart-pounding single-player race missions designed to test players’ Rope and Jet Pack skills to the limit! The "Time Attack" pack also includes 3 new hats, 3 new speech banks, 3 new gravestones, a new "Time Attack" landscape theme and 12 new...
